If you're not in the mood for something quite so intense, I'd also recommend "The Nanny" (2003). This quirky French comedy stars a talented Finnish actress and offers a unique blend of humor and heart, exploring the complexities of family dynamics.

I think you'd really enjoy "Point Break"! It's a classic heist movie with a great cast, including Keanu Reeves and Patrick Swayze. The film follows an FBI agent as he goes undercover to catch a group of bank robbers who just happen to be extreme sports enthusiasts - it's a wild ride!

If you're in the mood for something a bit different, I'd also recommend "Inside Man". It's a smart, tense thriller that explores the cat-and-mouse game between a detective and a cunning bank robber. Denzel Washington stars alongside Clive Owen in this gripping tale of high-stakes negotiations.
